citations.narrative:
There is a section of the wire mesh for the fox enclosure that is separated from the roof and is falling into the enclosure.
This downed section of mesh creates an avenue for the foxes to climb out of the enclosure and potentially escape. This
section of mesh must be maintained in good repair to effectively contain the foxes.
Correct by: March 3, 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
End Section

narrative:
3.125(a) 
   
Facilities, general. 
There is a section of the wire mesh for the fox enclosure that is separated from the roof and is falling into the enclosure. 
This downed section of mesh creates an avenue for the foxes to climb out of the enclosure and potentially escape. This 
section of mesh must be maintained in good repair to effectively contain the foxes.  
Correct by: March 3, 2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
End Section

species.common: RED FOX (INCLUDES SILVER FOX & CROSS FOX)
